parameters.query:
-- Enable UUID v7 extension for time-ordered unique identifiers
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "uuid-ossp";

-- Create users table with UUID v7 primary key
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password_hash VARCHAR(255),
    google_id VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    display_name VARCHAR(255),
    avatar_url TEXT,
    language VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'en',
    timezone VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'UTC',
    currency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'USD',
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Create money_accounts table for financial holdings
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS money_accounts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    account_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, -- 'bank', 'credit_card', 'cash', 'investment'
    institution_name VARCHAR(255),
    account_number VARCHAR(255),
    balance DECIMAL(15,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
    currency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'USD',
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Create index for better query performance
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_money_accounts_user_id ON money_accounts(user_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_money_accounts_type ON money_accounts(account_type);

-- Create spending_categories table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS spending_categories (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, -- NULL for system categories
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    color VARCHAR(7), -- Hex color code
    icon VARCHAR(50),
    is_system BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
    UNIQUE(user_id, name)
);

-- Create index for better query performance
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_spending_categories_user_id ON spending_categories(user_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_spending_categories_system ON spending_categories(is_system);

-- Create transactions table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transactions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    account_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES money_accounts(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    category_id UUID REFERENCES spending_categories(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    currency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'USD',
    description TEXT,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'expense', -- 'income', 'expense', 'transfer'
    merchant_name VARCHAR(255),
    location JSONB, -- Store latitude/longitude and address
    tags TEXT[], -- Array of tags for filtering
    receipt_url TEXT,
    notes TEXT,
    is_recurring BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    recurring_id UUID, -- Reference to parent recurring transaction
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Create indexes for better query performance
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_user_id ON transactions(user_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_account_id ON transactions(account_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_category_id ON transactions(category_id);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_date ON transactions(transaction_date);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_type ON transactions(transaction_type);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_tags ON transactions USING GIN(tags);

-- Seed default spending categories
INSERT INTO spending_categories (name, description, color, icon, is_system, is_active) VALUES
    ('Food & Dining', 'Restaurants, groceries, and food delivery', '#FF6B6B', 'restaurant', true, true),
    ('Transportation', 'Gas, public transport, rideshare, parking', '#4ECDC4', 'directions_car', true, true),
    ('Housing', 'Rent, mortgage, utilities, maintenance', '#45B7D1', 'home', true, true),
    ('Utilities', 'Electricity, water, gas, internet, phone', '#96CEB4', 'bolt', true, true),
    ('Healthcare', 'Medical bills, insurance, pharmacy', '#FFEAA7', 'local_hospital', true, true),
    ('Entertainment', 'Movies, games, streaming, hobbies', '#DDA0DD', 'movie', true, true),
    ('Shopping', 'Clothing, electronics, household items', '#98D8C8', 'shopping_cart', true, true),
    ('Education', 'Tuition, books, courses, training', '#F7DC6F', 'school', true, true),
    ('Travel', 'Flights, hotels, vacation expenses', '#BB8FCE', 'flight', true, true),
    ('Insurance', 'Auto, home, life, health insurance', '#85C1E9', 'security', true, true),
    ('Savings', 'Emergency fund, investments, retirement', '#82E0AA', 'savings', true, true),
    ('Other', 'Miscellaneous expenses', '#F8C471', 'category', true, true)
ON CONFLICT (name) WHERE user_id IS NULL DO NOTHING;

-- Verify all tables were created successfully
SELECT 
    schemaname,
    tablename,
    tableowner
FROM pg_tables 
WHERE schemaname = 'public' 
    AND tablename IN (
        'users', 'money_accounts', 'spending_categories', 'budgets', 
        'transactions', 'memories', 'data_metadata', 'data_rows', 
        'messages', 'alerts'
    )
ORDER BY tablename;

-- Verify seed data was inserted
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_categories,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN is_system = true THEN 1 END) as system_categories,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN is_active = true THEN 1 END) as active_categories
FROM spending_categories 
WHERE user_id IS NULL;

-- Get database schema summary
SELECT 
    'Database initialized successfully' as status,
    NOW() as initialization_time,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public') as total_tables,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spending_categories WHERE user_id IS NULL AND is_system = true) as system_categories;
